title: [Question] MY KCET RESULT , WHAT DO DO NOW
content:
I got best pes ecity cse core , show my question was what should I add above this option like what should give more priority than this in first round and further rounds my options are

Bms -- cse cyber , csbs,aiml
Msrit -- aids, aiml
Pes rr -- aiml

I know many of you work tell me to go with pes rr aiml but if I want less academic pressure and more freedom so what should I go with 

If I go till 3rd round then these are options i might get like if I am lucky to get around 200 rank inflation 

Msrit -- cse cyber around 200 rank inflation required 
Bms-- cse core around 200 rank inflation required

comments.body: If you are getting core CSE in pes ec, then honestly you should put only rvce CSE and pes CSE above that; Nothing else. If you are thinking about giving a priority to CSE+with something over CSE just give a thought about it.
I got pes ecity cse too did exactly that
I personally told OP exactly this on dm a day ago. Oh well.

Only put rr cse and rvce cse above ecc cse.
Bms and msrit are shit.
good luck with \~2200 CSE students only
If u want less academic pressure and more freedom, pes rr all the way

Be Patient . Wait till the 3rd Round No Matter What .  
You can add like RVCE(CSE) , RVCE(AIML) , RVCE(ECE)\[if interested\] , PESU RR(CSE) above the PES EC(CSE)

SJCE , Mysore is also pretty good now a days . If you are interested , that is an option too .
SJCE they didn't publish placements of last 2 years are you sure
but bmsce placements seem good this year is choosing pes ecc any good?

I would take pes over bms any day.
Even ecc has good coding culture and shit.
Plus a much better syllabus than vtu.
100% brother . I've got many seniors and also classmates who've studied/studying there
As I've heard , the coding culture is crazy in SJCE
okk I got JSSSTU in first round so ima proceed ig although I did think of putting bmsce
